acceptedAnswer.text: Bru Mas Ribera is a professional Frontend & UX Engineer with expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. He specializes in creating responsive, user-friendly web applications and has worked on projects like Open Huts, Reserve App, and Wegaw.

mainEntity.name: What projects has Bru Mas Ribera worked on?

acceptedAnswer.text: Bru Mas Ribera has developed several key projects including Open Huts (mountain hut booking platform), Reserve App (reservation management system), Wegaw (weather and outdoor activity platform), Pix4D, MoodleNet, Pomoca, and Clathes.

mainEntity.name: What technologies does Bru Mas Ribera use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Bru Mas Ribera specializes in React, TypeScript, modern web development, UX design, and responsive design. He creates fast, accessible, and user-friendly web applications.

mainEntity.name: How can I contact Bru Mas Ribera?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can contact Bru Mas Ribera through his portfolio website at bru.masribera.com, where you'll find contact information and can view his professional work and resume.

acceptedAnswer.text: Bru Mas Ribera is a Frontend & UX Engineer with a focus on creating modern, responsive web applications. He combines technical expertise with user experience design to deliver high-quality digital solutions.
